name: Hardest Robyn's Apparently Average Spelling Quiz | Humanities | 15 Questions

questions.text: I will _______ my body with oil.
My face flushed as I squirmed with _______.
_______ on campus will not be tolerated.
She was in _______ over her beautiful new dress.
A Swiss Army knife is _______ when you are camping.
If you leave strips of fruit out in the hot sun, they will _______.
This _______ is not getting off to a very good start.
We had better begin to ______ everyone against small pox.
This agenda item will _______ that one.
questions.explanation:
supersede.

	The alternative spelling of supercede is also used.

questions.text: The last time this happened, I warned you that if there was another _______, you would be expelled.
This hotel can _______ ten more guests.
She formed an illicit _______ with a married man.
The _______ among us is that we should reject the proposal.
My last remark was _______. I wish I had not made it.
